problems.title: Blowing Dust / Suction Loss
solution_steps: Ensure you are using Type MM bags.

problems.title: Overheating / Shuts Off
problems.description: Vacuum gets very hot and stops.
solution_steps: Check the small filter on the back of the unit.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the suction on a Mighty Mite Canister (3670G)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement filter or seal typically costs significantly less than a new $489 vacuum, and extending the life of your Eureka is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Mighty Mite Canister (3670G) needs a new filter or seal?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the filter or seal on my Mighty Mite Canister (3670G) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
